price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߲߬ ߓߘߊ߫ ߓߊ߲߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߓߊ߲߬ ߠߴߊ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߞߘߐ߬ߡߊ߲߫ ، ߞߵߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߘߏ߲߰ߣߍ߲ ߡߊߝߊ߲߬ߝߊ߲ ߘߌ߫ ߦߙߐ߫ ߖߊ߲ ߘߐ߫
arabic: وَقَدۡ كَفَرُواْ بِهِۦ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَيَقۡذِفُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ مِن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waqad kafarū bihi min qablu wayaqdhifūna bil-ghaybi min makānin baʿīdin
